caption.p: Principal component analysis (Loading plots) of antibacterial activity of Angolan Lippia multiflora Moldenke EOs. The wells diffusion agar technique tested three concentrations (C 1, C 2, C 3) against Streptococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Escherichia coli. ( a) Loading plost of PC1 vs. PC2; ( b) Loading plots of PC1 vs. PC3; ( c) Loading plots of PC2 vs. PC3.
